alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Missouri Headwaters; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 1:54PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central Montana. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The heavy, wet snow could lead to tree damage where foliage remains. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated power outages possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock, please visit our webpage and select Local Programs, then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
